Function reference

Connection to PHS database

Connection to PHS database

phs_db_connection()
Open a connection to a PHS database

Check

is_missing()
Check for NA or blank values in a character vector

Years & Dates

Dates within Financial Year

Functions to compute the start, end and midpoint dates of a financial year, and convert date types

end_fy()
Return the end date of FY years
midpoint_fy()
Return the mid date of FY year
start_fy()
Return the start date of FY year
convert_date_to_numeric()
Convert a date type to the 'SLF numeric format'
convert_numeric_to_date()
Convert a date in 'SLF numeric format' to Date type

Year Format

Functions to convert between financial year and calendar year, and check that the year variable is in the correct format

convert_fyyear_to_year()
Convert year types - Financial year form to the alternate form
convert_year_to_fyyear()
Convert year types - Alternate year form to financial year form
check_year_format()
Check that the year is in the correct format

Create

Costs

Functions to create costs variables and fix costs

create_day_episode_costs()
Assign costs for single day episodes to the relevant month
create_monthly_costs()
Create monthly costs
fix_c3_costs()
Apply costs fix to specialty C3 in acute processing.

Flags

Functions to create flag variables

create_demog_test_flags()
Create demographic test flags
create_hb_cost_test_flags()
Create Health Board cost test flags
create_hb_test_flags()
Create Health Board test flags
create_hscp_test_flags()
Create HSCP test flags

Monthly

Functions to convert monthly variables, beddays

convert_monthly_rows_to_vars()
Convert monthly rows to variables
create_monthly_beddays()
Generate counts of beddays per month for an episode with an admission and discharge date

Codes

Convert various codes to alternate forms

convert_ca_to_lca()
Convert Council Areas into Local Council Authority Codes
convert_eng_gpprac_to_dummy()
Convert English GP practice codes to a dummy code
convert_hb_to_hbnames()
Convert NHS Health Board Codes to NHS Health Board Names
convert_hscp_to_hscpnames()
Convert HSCP Codes to HSCP Names
read_anon_to_chi()
Read the Anon to CHI lookup
read_chi_to_anon()
Read the CHI to Anon lookup

Duplicates

Functions to fix duplicates

fix_east_ayrshire_duplicates()
Fix the East Ayrshire duplicates
fix_west_dun_duplicates()
Fix the West Dunbartonshire duplicates

Writing data

Functions which mask the typical data write functions to add some nice defaults and importantly fix file permissions.

write_sav()
Write an SPSS zsav file
write_rds()
Write an R rds file

Initialisation

Get the date of update, period, and extract number

get_dd_period()
Get the Delayed Discharge period
latest_update()
Get the latest update
previous_update()
Get the previous update
it_extract_ref()
Get the IT extract ref number

Files

Directories

File Directories for SLFâ€™s

get_lookups_dir()
Get the path to the lookups directory
get_slf_dir()
General SLF directory for accessing HSCDIIP folders/files
get_year_dir()
Get the directory for the given year

File Paths for SLFâ€™s

Process SLF Extracts

process_homelessness_extract()
Process the homelessness extract

Testing

Tests for the SLF Extracts
